pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, December 2, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, December 2, 2017:

All times local.

Richmond, British Columbia

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Beijing, China.

Landmark Aviation
4360 Agar Drive

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity of departure
